languages.text: {n}Идира с трудом сглатывает. Кажется, она пытается заплакать, но ее глаза остаются сухими.{/n} "Но если я... решу уйти... господин Тервантьяс наверняка захочет вернуть себе... снять эту штуку... и тогда шепотки вернутся. И снова... поманят. Что тогда, {name}?"

{n}Idira struggles to swallow. You think she might be trying to cry, but no tears come out.{/n} "But if I... decide to leave... then Master Tervantias will surely want it back... He'll want to remove this thing... and then the whispers will return. They'll start... beckoning me again. What then, {name}?"
languages.original_text: {n}Идира с трудом сглатывает. Кажется, она пытается заплакать, но ее глаза остаются сухими.{/n} "Но если я... решу уйти... господин Тервантьяс наверняка захочет вернуть себе... снять эту штуку... и тогда шепотки вернутся. И снова... поманят. Что тогда, {name}?"

They'll start... beckoning me again. What then, {name}?"
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}イディラは必死に飲み込もうとしている。泣いているのかと思ったが、涙は出てこない。{/n}「だけどもし…ここを離れると決めれば…テルヴァンティアス様はきっと返せと言うわ…彼はこれを外せと言う…そしたらまた囁き声が戻って来る。また私を…そそのかそうとするわ。その時はどうしたらいいの、{name}？」
languages.original_text: {n}Idira struggles to swallow. You think she might be trying to cry, but no tears come out.{/n} "But if I... decide to leave... then Master Tervantias will surely want it back... He'll want to remove this thing... and then the whispers will return. They'll start... beckoning me again. What then, {name}?"

traits.locale_text: {n}イディラは必死に飲み込もうとしている。泣いているのかと思ったが、涙は出てこない。{/n}「だけどもし…ここを離れると決めれば…テルヴァンティアス様はきっと返せと言うわ…彼はこれを外せと言う…そしたらまた囁き声が戻って来る。また私を…そそのかそうとするわ。その時はどうしたらいいの、{name}？」
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}伊迪拉挣扎着，咽了口口水。你觉得她多半是在哭，但她的双眼却没有流出眼泪。{/n}“可如果我……打算离开的话……特万提亚斯大师肯定会拿走这件东西……把它摘掉……之后，那些窃窃私语就又会回来了。他们会再次……召唤我，你觉得到时候会怎么样呢，{name}？”
languages.original_text: {n}Idira struggles to swallow. You think she might be trying to cry, but no tears come out.{/n} "But if I... decide to leave... then Master Tervantias will surely want it back... He'll want to remove this thing... and then the whispers will return. They'll start... beckoning me again. What then, {name}?"

traits.locale_text: {n}伊迪拉挣扎着，咽了口口水。你觉得她多半是在哭，但她的双眼却没有流出眼泪。{/n}“可如果我……打算离开的话……特万提亚斯大师肯定会拿走这件东西……把它摘掉……之后，那些窃窃私语就又会回来了。他们会再次……召唤我，你觉得到时候会怎么样呢，{name}？”
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}Idira traga saliva con dificultad. Crees que intenta llorar, pero no le sale ninguna lágrima.{/n} «Pero si... decido irme... entonces el amo Tervantias seguramente querrá que se lo devuelva... Querrá quitarme esta cosa... y los susurros volverán. Comenzarán... a hablarme de nuevo. ¿Entonces qué, {name}?».
languages.original_text: {n}Idira struggles to swallow. You think she might be trying to cry, but no tears come out.{/n} "But if I... decide to leave... then Master Tervantias will surely want it back... He'll want to remove this thing... and then the whispers will return. They'll start... beckoning me again. What then, {name}?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Idira traga saliva con dificultad. Crees que intenta llorar, pero no le sale ninguna lágrima.{/n} «Pero si... decido irme... entonces el amo Tervantias seguramente querrá que se lo devuelva... Si me quito esta cosa... los susurros volverán. Comenzarán... a hablarme de nuevo. ¿Entonces qué, {name}?».
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}Idira hat Mühe, zu schlucken. Du glaubst, dass sie vielleicht versucht zu weinen, aber keine Tränen kommen.{/n} "Aber wenn ich ... entscheide zu gehen ... wird Meister Tervantias es sicher zurückhaben wollen ... Er wird dieses Ding entfernen wollen ... und dann kommen die Flüsterer wieder. Sie fangen wieder an ... mich zu rufen. Was dann, {name}?"
languages.original_text: {n}Idira struggles to swallow. You think she might be trying to cry, but no tears come out.{/n} "But if I... decide to leave... then Master Tervantias will surely want it back... He'll want to remove this thing... and then the whispers will return. They'll start... beckoning me again. What then, {name}?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Idira hat Mühe zu schlucken. Du glaubst, dass sie vielleicht versucht zu weinen, aber keine Tränen kommen.{/n} "Aber wenn ich ... entscheide zu gehen ... dann wird Meister Tervantias es sicher zurückhaben wollen ... dieses Ding entfernen ... und dann kommen die Flüsterer wieder. Sie fangen wieder an ... mich zu rufen. Was dann, {name}?"
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}Elle déglutit avec difficulté, visiblement au bord des larmes, mais incapable de pleurer.{/n} « Mais... si je décide de partir... alors, maître Tervantias voudra sûrement le récupérer... Il voudra le retirer... et les murmures reviendront. Ils... recommenceront à me harceler. Et dans ce cas, qu'est-ce qui va se passer, {name} ? »
languages.original_text: {n}Idira struggles to swallow. You think she might be trying to cry, but no tears come out.{/n} "But if I... decide to leave... then Master Tervantias will surely want it back... He'll want to remove this thing... and then the whispers will return. They'll start... beckoning me again. What then, {name}?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Elle déglutit avec difficulté, visiblement au bord des larmes, mais incapable de pleurer.{/n} « Mais... si je décide de partir... alors, maître Tervantias voudra sûrement le récupérer... ce truc... et les murmures reviendront. Ils... recommenceront à me harceler. Et dans ce cas, qu'est-ce qui va se passer, {name} ? »
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}İdira, zorlanarak yutkunuyor. Ağlamaya çalışıyor sanıyorsun ancak gözlerinden yaş akmıyor.{/n} "Fakat... Gitmeye karar verirsem... O zaman Üstat Tervantias, bunu geri almak isteyecektir... Bu şeyi çıkarmak isteyecektir... Sonra da fısıltılar dönecek. Yine... Beni çağırmaya başlayacaklar. O zaman ne olacak {name}?"
languages.original_text: {n}Idira struggles to swallow. You think she might be trying to cry, but no tears come out.{/n} "But if I... decide to leave... then Master Tervantias will surely want it back... He'll want to remove this thing... and then the whispers will return. They'll start... beckoning me again. What then, {name}?"

traits.locale_text: {n}İdira zorlanarak yutkunuyor. Ağlamaya çalışıyor sanıyorsun ancak gözlerinden yaş akmıyor.{/n} "Ama... Gitmeye karar verirsem... O zaman Üstat Tervantias bunu geri almak isteyecektir... Bu şeyi çıkarmak isteyecektir... Sonra da fısıltılar geri dönecek. Tekrar... Beni çağırmaya başlayacaklar. O zaman ne olacak {name}?"
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion
